# Land Development Services

__

#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m. 

__

703-222-0801 TTY 711

__

LandDevelopmentServices@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Pkwy  
Fairfax, VA 22035

fairfaxcounty

Bill Hicks

# Permit Library: Commercial Building

## ON THIS PAGE

  * New Building
  * Addition/Alteration
  * Miscellaneous
  * Retaining Wall
  * Demolition



  * Electrical
  * Mechanical
  * Plumbing
  * Solar



## New Building

A commercial New Building permit is required for the following types of projects:

  * New commercial building (footing/foundation, full commercial, garage, pool/bathhouse, shell only)
  * New multi-family (building, floor, footing/foundation, garage, shell only, unit)
  * Detached commercial structure (carport, garage, gazebo, greenhouse, shed, shell only)
  * Commercial addition (canopy/awning, one story, second story over existing structure, shell only, two stories above)



Learn More

## Addition/Alteration

A commercial addition/alteration permit is required for the following projects:

  * Interior Alterations
  * Interior alterations for an existing tenant or owner
  * Interior alterations with additional square footage
  * Interior demolition
  * Metal stud only
  * Installation of modular furniture
  * New tenant layout



Learn More

## Miscellaneous

A Commercial Miscellaneous permit is required for the following commercial projects:

  * Antenna
  * Asbestos Abatement
  * Balcony Repair
  * Commercial Sales Trailer
  * Deck
  * Exterior Waterproofing
  * Foundation Repair



  * Interior Drain Tile
  * Maximum Occupant Load
  * Miscellaneous Building Work
  * Pool/Spa
  * Re-Roof/Re-Line
  * Roof Repair



  


Learn More

## Retaining Wall

A commercial Retaining Wall permit is required for construction of commercial retaining walls retaining more than four feet of unbalanced fill/earth or sheeting and shoring.

Learn More

## Demolition

A Commercial Demolition permit is required for the complete demolition of a commercial structure, partial demolition, and demolition of commercial pools.

Learn More

## Electrical

Commercial electrical permits, commonly referred to as “trades permits”, are required for heavy-up, new, repair or replacement projects.

Learn More

## Mechanical

Commercial mechanical permits, commonly referred to as “trades permits”, are required for conversion, new, repair or replacement projects.

Learn More

## Plumbing

Commercial plumbing permits, commonly referred to as “trades permits,” are required for conversion, new, repair or replacement projects.

Learn More

## Solar

A commercial solar permit is required for roof mounted and free-standing solar panel installations.

Learn More

  


Back to Top

  
Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.

metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - LDS building and site records are applied for in PLUS. Below you will find a list of LDS record types available in PLUS along with the associated process requirements for that record.
